div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 25 Corinth environs, 1952-1953 Burial: 430-415 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 250+ AR Pegasi: Corinth and colonies Disposition: London 21 (Corinth 17, Leucas 2, Ambracia 2) Jenkins, BMQ 1954, p. 13, illus. (5) Additional information from Charles Hersh
